data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I registered Lingua::PT::pln, it was accepted, but to be like other
    modules, changed to Lingua::PT::PLN.

    So if possible, please change it.

    Also, I wrote a Lingua::PT::PLNbase, a basic module for PLN in
    which Lingua::PT::PLN relies. Maybe it would be interesting to
    register both. SHould I submit a new registeration ticket?

    THanks Merry Christmas :)
